name: Aubergine
description: Eat better, feel different. Aubergine Kitchen is a family-owned restaurant focused on making healthy eating easy, convenient, and sustainable.

name: Puro Peru
description: Taste something new at Puro Peru, the best restaurant in Sandy, UT, for authentic Peruvian cuisine. We bring the fiesta to our community with classic Peruvian dishes, live entertainment, and hard-to-beat prices. Whether you're in the mood for creamy chicken chili or smoky beef stew, our menu is packed with delicious and original recipes you won't want to miss out on. Let us make dinner tonight; take a trip to our Peruvian restaurant and give yourself a dining experience to remember.

name: Life Alive
description: Organic, plant-based cafe in the Boston area serving food that is good for you and good for the planet. Breakfast, lunch, dinner, smoothies, meal plans.

name: The Cheesecake Factory
description: Our menu has more than 250 dishes, freshly prepared and from scratch, to order, every day.

name: Blue Lemon
description: Made from scratch in our kitchen to your table, we make pure clean food with a twist! Our menu makes it easy to order delicious food to fuel your day. With our carefully crafted salads, artisan sandwiches, and delectable entrees we have something for everyone!

name: Ruths Chris Steak House
description: At Ruth's Chris, your last bite is just as good as your first. Our perfected broiling method and seasoning techniques ensure each cut of USDA Prime beef we serve arrives cooked to perfection and sizzling on a 500° plate—just the way Ruth liked it.

name: The Daily Paper
description: We serve only the freshest local food. Our fish and produce all come from local purveyors.

name: Top of the Hub
description: Soaring 52 floors above the Back Bay, Top of the Hub’s award winning cuisine, service and ambiance of comfortable sophistication blend with the serenity of Boston’s best skyline views to deliver a truly one-of-a-kind dining experience.

name: DiParma
description: Easygoing, family-friendly Italian restaurant offering pizza, pasta & a large bar, plus delivery.

name: Texas Roadhouse
description: Legendary Service® starts with taking no shortcuts. We take great pride in every plate we serve, every time.

name: Olive Garden
description: Olive Garden is an American casual dining restaurant chain specializing in Italian-American cuisine.

name: 99 Restaurants
description: Our new menu is filled with favorites like the St. Louis BBQ Ribs, Sirloin & Seafood Trio Combo, Pork Carnitas Mac & Cheese and more.

name: Sam Diego's
description: Colorful restaurant with outdoor tables & a bar doling out tacos, quesadillas & other Mexican bites.

name: Chipotle
description: Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc., often known simply as Chipotle, is an American chain of fast casual restaurants specializing in bowls, tacos and Mission burritos.

name: Panera Bread
description: Panera Bread Company is an American chain store of bakery-café

name: Arby's
description: Arby's is an American fast food sandwich restaurant

name: IHOP
description: IHOP is an American multinational pancake house restaurant chain that specializes in American breakfast foods.

name: TGI Friday's
description: TGI Fridays is an American restaurant chain focusing on primarily American cuisine and casual dining.

name: Shake Shack
description: Shake Shack is an American fast casual restaurant chain based in New York City.

name: Ruby Tuesday
description: Ruby Tuesday Inc. is an American multinational foodservice retailer that owns, operates, and franchises Ruby Tuesday restaurants.

name: Sarku Japan
description: Chain offering made-to-order teppanyaki-style Japanese dishes cooked on sizzling grills, plus sushi.
